name: The Wizard's Tower (itch) (JdR2)
description:
This games was made for the Narrative Game Jam 2020. The theme was: Isolation.

Note: This is my first game for a Game Jam, I used RPG Maker VX Ace, this games includes RTP Data.

As I'm not an artist, almost all of the assets that where used in this game are the basic assets that come with RPG Maker VX Ace, except for some tile sets, witch the credits of those are at the end of the game.

Also, if there's any typo or something grammatically incorrect I do apologize, English is not my native language.
